I shall keep <S%H8104><s%> Thy statutes; <S%H2706><s%> Do not forsake <S%H5800><s%> me utterly <S%H5704><s%>! <S%H3966><s%>

I will meditate <S%H7878><s%> on Thy precepts, <S%H6490><s%> And regard <S%H5027><s%> Thy ways. <S%H734><s%>

Open <S%H1540><s%> my eyes, <S%H5869><s%> that I may behold <S%H5027><s%> Wonderful <S%H6381><s%> things <S%H6381><s%> from Thy law. <S%H8451><s%>

Take <S%H1556><s%> away <S%H1556><s%> reproach <S%H2781><s%> and contempt <S%H937><s%> from me, For I observe <S%H5341><s%> Thy testimonies. <S%H9381><s%>

My soul <S%H5315><s%> weeps <S%H1811><s%> because <S%H4480><s%> of grief; <S%H8424><s%> Strengthen <S%H6965><s%> me according to Thy word. <S%H1697><s%>

Incline <S%H5186><s%> my heart <S%H3820><s%> to Thy testimonies, <S%H5715><s%> And not to [dishonest] gain. <S%H1215><s%>

So I shall have <S%H6030><s%> an answer <S%H6030><s%> <S%H1697><s%> for him who reproaches <S%H2778><s%> me, For I trust <S%H982><s%> in Thy word. <S%H1697><s%>

And do not take <S%H5337><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> of truth <S%H571><s%> utterly <S%H5704><s%> <S%H3966><s%> out of my mouth, <S%H6310><s%> For I wait <S%H3176><s%> for Thine ordinances. <S%H4941><s%>
So I will keep <S%H8104><s%> Thy law <S%H8451><s%> continually, <S%H8548><s%> Forever <S%H5769><s%> and ever. <S%H5703><s%>
And I will walk <S%H1980><s%> at liberty, <S%H7342><s%> For I seek <S%H1875><s%> Thy precepts. <S%H6490><s%>

And I shall delight <S%H8173><s%> in Thy commandments, <S%H4687><s%> Which <S%H834><s%> I love. <S%H157><s%>
And I shall lift <S%H5375><s%> up my hands <S%H3709><s%> to Thy commandments, <S%H4687><s%> Which <S%H834><s%> I love; <S%H157><s%> And I will meditate <S%H7878><s%> on Thy statutes. <S%H2706><s%>
